WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS THRU 21 JUN
   BY M/V RAMFORM TETHYS TOWING 12 8000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-14.59S 047-06.48W, 26-49.19S 046-41.07W,
   26-44.55S 046-40.34W, 26-45.04S 044-58.45W,
   28-14.39S 044-58.26W, 28-14.34S 047-16.30W,
   27-28.07S 047-16.30W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 220100Z JUN 23.
